iamnewblock.title: I am New!
iamnewblock.desc: New fresh baked goods and drinks will cheer you up and charge you with positive emotions. Check out the list of our new products that we have prepared for you. They are waiting for you in the nearest coffee shop, click and learn a lot of new things.

joinusblock.title: Join us!
joinusblock.desc: Stay in touch with us to tell about your impressions and share pleasant moments with friends

findpoint.title: Find nearest point!
findpoint.desc: Easily find the nearest coffee shop among dozens of outlets and go there for new flavors that are waiting for you.

footer.little: Good coffee and delicious pastries will cheer you up, fill your break with pleasant moments that you will wait every day.

menucategory.oops: Oops..This category is tired. Please, try again later.

tray.title: Tray
tray.desc: Add products to your basket and order in just a couple of clicks. And soon you will receive your order packed in eco-friendly packaging that reliably preserves taste and warmth.

account.title: My account
account.desc: Your personal account will store all the necessary information so that you can place orders and pay in a couple of clicks at any time. Your personal data is under reliable protection.
account.adesc: Administrator mode is activated. Do not share your login information with this account. Administrator mode allows you to fully control the operation of the site.

contacts.title: Our contacts
contacts.desc: Stay in touch with us to tell about your impressions and share pleasant moments with friends. And we will also be happy if you mark us on social networks and invite friends.

comminment.title: Our comminment
comminment.desc: We guarantee unmatched quality every day, strive to grow and improve, because we love our business.
comminment.phrase: Every day we work for your bests coffee cup and always will!

myorders.title: My orders
myorders.desc: We have saved all your previous orders so that you can always remember your favorite products and affiliates. You can also follow the status of your order here.

statistic.noitems: No sold items for today yet..
statistic.title: Statistic
statistic.desc: All the necessary sales statistics for today in one place. Lets you see how the business is progressing from day to day.

orderscontrol.title: Orders control
orderscontrol.desc: Manage order processing and change order status by dragging and dropping the order card to the next window.

branches.title: Branches
branches.desc: Many of our wonderful coffee houses are waiting for you at these addresses. Find the address closest to you and enjoy our service.

confirm.branchnotpop: This branch is not popular any more?
confirm.savecredit: Save this credit card for your account? It will help you pay more fast the next time. This option it safety.
confirm.ordnotconfirm: Order not confirmed! Pleace, try again.
confirm.wantlogout: Do you want to log out?
confirm.suredelaccount: Are you sure you wont to delete your account?
confirm.nouser: There is no user with email
confirm.orpas: or password is wrong. Please, try again.
